entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Showers beginning late in the afternoon.
